chinese: 加编码，代码；准则
这位程序员正在电脑上为一款新软件写代码。
english: The programmer is writing code for the new software on his computer

chinese: v 痊愈，恢复健康；恢复；收回；换回；
他的脚伤已经痊愈了。
english: He has recovered well from his foot injury

chinese: n.肥胖
那个患有肥胖症的男人过着一种不健康的生活。
english: The man suffers from obesity and lives an unhealthy lifestyle

chinese: n.文盲，目不识丁者 adj缺乏（某方面）知识的
文盲无法阅读。
adj.违法的，违禁的
警察查获并收缴了违禁药品。
english: The police found and seized the illicit drugs

chinese: 几渴；干渴，缺水
这瓶宝贵的水能让他解渴。
english: The precious water can satisfy his thirst

chinese: adj. 机密的
他们把这份机密文件放在保险箱里。
english: They put the classified document in a safe

chinese: ad）.数学的；精确的
她很擅长解答数学难题。
english: She is good at solving mathematical puzzles

chinese: 几.奖金，额外津贴
和其他人比，他的年终奖很特别。
english: As compared to others, his annual bonus is so special

chinese: vi. 发生
车祸会发生在一瞬间。
english: Car accidents can occur very quickly

chinese: 1.人质
这只猴子为了索要香蕉，抓住了那个男孩当人
english: The monkey held the boy hostage in exchange for bananas

chinese: n.地图集
地图集包含了世界上所有国家的信息。
english: The atlas contains information about all the countries in the world

chinese: edj，明智的，理智的；可觉察的
轻装上阵去爬山是一个明智的选择。
english: It's a sensible choice to take only a few things when going climbing

chinese: adj.生来就有的；内在的，固有的
这个小女孩天生就爱美。
english: The baby girl has an inherent love of beauty

chinese: 几探索；研究
她拿着手电筒在洞穴里探索。
english: She used her flashlight during her exploration of the cave

chinese: n.耻辱
他因为考试作弊而面临必须公开道歉的耻辱。
english: He faces the humiliation of having to apologize openly for cheating in the exam
